name: Sengoku Hime 3: Tenka o Kirisaku Hikari to Kage
name_original: Sengoku Hime 3: Tenka o Kirisaku Hikari to Kage
description:
Sengoku Hime 3: Tenka o Kirisaku Hikari to Kage is a strategy game developed by SystemSoft, SystemSoft Alpha and Unicorn-A. It came out on 29-03-2012. SystemSoft Alpha published the game.
Sengoku Hime 3: Tenka o Kirisaku Hikari to Kage is available on PlayStation 3, PC, PS Vita and PSP.
